title: Seamless Pipe
summary: High-quality seamless pipe for oil, gas, and industrial applications.
schedules: All Standardized WT and other upon request
materialGrade: ASTM/ A106 GR.B, A53 GR.B, API 5LGR.B, X42, X52, X60, ASTM A312, TP-304, 304L, 316, 316L, ASTM A333 GR6, ASTM A335 P5, P11
specialItems: Inconel/Nickel Alloy Steel/High Alloy/Duplex and other Exotic materials.
extraNotes: We have the resources to assist and cater to any of your needs. Let us know your expectation, and we will package to timely delivery. ASTM A106 GR.A, AO16 GR.C, API 5L-GRADES, A312, TP 304H, 321H, 347H, 309, 310, ALLOY 20, ASTM A335, P1, P11, P22, P5, P9.

title: Pipe Fittings
summary: Butt-weld fittings across elbows, tees, reducers and more.
schedules: All Standardized WT and other upon request
standards: ANSI B16.9 – ANSI B16.28 – MSS SP43 – MSS SP75 – ANSI B16.25 (BEVELS) – DIN – AFNOR
specialItems: Elbow 90°, 45°, 180° (All sizes); Tees (All sizes); Tees Type Reducing (All sizes); Reducer (All sizes)
extraNotes: MTRs and EN10204 3.1 available upon request.

title: Forged Fittings
summary: Forged fittings for high-pressure services with SW/THD ends.
sizes: 1/4” to 4” and over for all branches
schedules: All Standardized WT and other upon request
standards: ANSI B16.9 – ANSI B16.28 – MSS SP43 – MSS SP75 – ANSI B16.25 (BEVELS) – DIN – AFNOR
specialItems: Elbow 90°, Tees, Tees Type Reducing, Coupling, Half Coupling, Union, Pipe Nipple, Swage Nipple, Bushing, Cross, End Caps, Plug, Branches with but-weld, Threaded, Socket-weld ends, Straight or Reduced Nipple, Lateral shape

title: Valves
summary: Comprehensive range: ball, gate, globe, check, plug, needle, butterfly and more.
materialGrade: Cast and forged carbon steels, low temperature steels, alloy steels, stainless steels, duplex, cast iron, bronze, brass
specialItems: Ball Valve (Floating / Trunnion Mounted / Side Entry / Top Entry / 1,2,3 Pieces Body), Gate (std & Through Conduit), Globe, Check (Swing/Piston/Ball-type), Plug, Needle, Knife Gate, Butterfly, Safety Relief, Control, Strainer, Diaphragm, Steam Traps; Operators: Hand wheel / Gear / Electric / Pneumatic
extraNotes: Connections: SW – NPT – BW – FLANGED – WAFER TYPE (Check & Butterfly)

title: Flanges
summary: Welding Neck, Slip On, Lap Joint, Blind, Threaded, Socket Welding, Long Welding Neck, Orifice, Spectacle Blind.
standards: ANSI B16.5 – BSS3293 – MSS SP 44 – API605 – ANSI B16.47 – ANSI B16.36
materialGrade: A105, A350 LF2, A182 F304/L, F316/L, Duplex
extraNotes: All Standardized WT and other upon request

title: Tube Fittings & Instrumentation
summary: Tube fittings, instrumentation valves, manifolds, and tubings.
specialItems: Types: Tube to Male Pipe, Tube to Female Pipe, Tube to Tube & Port Connection; Instrumentation Valves: Needle, Metering, Ball & Plug, Check, Relief & Filters; Manifolds: 2, 3, 5 Valve Manifolds, Flanged & Double Block & Bleed
extraNotes: Bar Stock: ASME-SA479 316-S.S, BS970 316-S31, DIN 4401, ASTM A276 Type 316. Forging: ASME-SA182 316-S.S, BS970 316-S31, DIN 4401. Tubings: ASME-SE213, ASTM-A-213, ASTM-A-249, ASTM-A-269, MILT T–8504, MILT T–8506

title: Studs & Bolts
summary: Stud bolts and fasteners for flanged joints and general service.
sizes: Stud Bolts – M8 to M200 ISO thread; 3/8” to 8” UNC/UNS; other sizes upon request
standards: ASME – ASTM – DIN – AFNOR – BS – UNI – ISO
specialItems: PTFE coated and specials by drawing

title: Gaskets
summary: Flat gaskets, spiral wound, isolation kits, and ring type gaskets.
standards: ANSI – API – AFNOR – ISO – other standards upon request
specialItems: Flat, Spiral Wound, Flange Isolation Kits, Ring Type (Oval & Octagonal)

title: Gauges Flexible Tubes
summary: Pressure and differential gauges, thermometers, seals, and accessories.
specialItems: Pressure Gauges (AISI 316L / Bronze/Brass), Differential and Low Pressure Gauges, Thermometers, Diaphragm Seals, Thermowells, Stainless Steel Flexible Hose, Teflon Hose with S.S braiding

title: Expansion Joints
summary: Metallic and rubber expansion joints; bellows and accessories.
specialItems: Tie rods, liners, covers, special constructions; Bellows in steel and rubber
extraNotes: Engineering support for selection and sizing
